name: current-user-avatar-react-router
title: Current User Avatar (React Router)
description: A reactive avatar component that displays the current authenticated user's image and name. Updates automatically when user data changes. Includes Convex backend for user queries.
docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `VITE_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.
